title: Meta cutting roughly 600 AI jobs as company aims to move faster
description: Meta Platforms Inc is cutting approximately 600 jobs from the company's artificial intelligence unit, Meta Superintelligence Labs, as it aims to move more quickly in the competitive AI race.
content:
Meta Platforms Inc is cutting approximately 600 jobs from the company’s artificial intelligence unit, Meta Superintelligence Labs, as it aims to move more quickly in the competitive AI race.

title: AI tool beats humans at detecting parasites in stool samples
description: Scientists at ARUP Laboratories have developed an artificial intelligence (AI) tool that detects intestinal parasites in stool samples more quickly and accurately than traditional methods, potentially transforming how labs diagnose parasitic infections around the world.
